sentences.en: Claire worked to beautify the garden.
Decorate the room for the party; beautify yourself for the special day.
sentences.cn: 为了晚会装饰房子; 为了特殊的节日美化自己.

sentences.en: Every gesture reflects the poise, unite as one and beautify the campus.
sentences.cn: 一举一动体现风度, 同心同德美化校园.

sentences.en: If he is free, he can beautify the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 如果他有空的话, 他就会美化这个庭院.

sentences.en: If he is free, he will beautify the courtyard next Sunday.
sentences.cn: 如果他有空的话, 他下周日就会美化这个庭院.

sentences.en: In addition, planting trees helps improve and beautify the environment.
sentences.cn: 另外, 植树不仅能够改善环境也能美化环境.

sentences.en: Ingredients List: Deep ocean algae, sea salt, beautify - body essence and almond oil.
sentences.cn: 成份表: 深海海藻, 海盐, 美体精华,杏仁油.

sentences.en: Planting flowers along the boulevards will help to beautify the town.
sentences.cn: 沿林阴大道种花将有助于美化城镇.

sentences.en: Serving to beautify the body, especially the face and hair.
sentences.cn: 用于美化身体的(尤指面部和头发 )

sentences.en: They not only make life convenient, but also beautify the environment.
sentences.cn: 这些桥不仅方便了人们的生活, 也把水乡点缀得如诗如画.

sentences.en: This potted plant can purify the air, beautify the classroom.
sentences.cn: 这盆花可以净化空气, 美化教室.

sentences.en: We should spare no effort to beautify our environment.
sentences.cn: 我们应该不遗余力的美化我们的环境.

sentences.en: What you can improve and beautify is the mind.
sentences.cn: 然而,你可以改进与美化的是这颗心.

sentences.en: With Chinese paintings and calligraphic pieces, you can Beautify your life.
sentences.cn: 家有中国书画, 美化你的生活.

sentences.en: Without reaching it, you beautify and mythicize it in your imagination.
sentences.cn: 因为得不到,就把它放在自己的想象里, 美化,神话.

words.tran_cn: 美；美丽；美人；美好的东西

trans.tran_en: to make someone or something beautiful
